ticket.title: Rails(on rack) customize reqeust parameters raise error
ticket.original-body: If some people customeize request parameters for example: (?id=1&id[]=1), rails will raise error and make error log file larger.
ticket.latest-body: If some people customeize request parameters for example: (?id=1&id[]=1), rails will raise error and make error log file larger.
ticket.original-body-html: If some people customeize request parameters for example: (?id=1&id[]=1), rails will raise error and make error log file larger.

version.body: If some people customeize request parameters for example: (?id=1&id[]=1), rails will raise error and make error log file larger.
version.body-html: If some people customeize request parameters for example: (?id=1&id[]=1), rails will raise error and make error log file larger.
version.title: Rails(on rack) customize reqeust parameters raise error

version.body:
Could you give us a little more information about what you did and which error message you got? That'd make it easier to fix the problem. ;)
Let's mark this one as incomplete until we get more info.
